resources.string: Click here to read the Main Story that\'s in progress.

Nagisa blatantly expresses her desire of disgust the first time she came to the Venus Island, to try and convince her sister to leave immediately. Albeit apologized for what she did, it did come to the conclusion that her constant arrogance over the course became the grounds for some... rather bad events. Could the new Ona-san help her with her situation and put an end to her constant despair?
Admirant of the Past - Fiona\'s Inside Story

Browsing through the biography book were some of her interesting experiences at the island, including her deep affection, revealing her nature of being an admirer. Admitting that it was the previous Owner whom she admired, how could she handle the stresses of being with him back to her faraway home?
Admirant of the Present - Tsukushi\'s Inside Story
Following the party is the secret a former tourist doesn’t want to expose. But how will her secrecy be revealed to the new Owner as they go?
Admirant of the Future - Nyotengu\'s Inside Story
As Nyotengu’s birthday is just around the corner, the stage is set for the new Owner to help out the three Admirers for the sake of the Venus Island.
Everything went Dark - Luna\'s Inside Story
The blackout has put the whole operation into a standstill. Could they survive the lingering darkness with Luna’s help?
